## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer">ScheduleHazardRecognizer</a></>}>
HazardRecognizer - This determines whether or not an instruction can be issued this cycle, and whether or not a noop needs to be inserted to handle the hazard. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// state. Important to restore the state after backtracking. Additionally,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// MaxLookAhead=0 identifies a fake recognizer, allowing the client to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// bypass virtual calls. Currently the PostRA scheduler ignores it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#a6acf461721a59cf5cf404b80b5f57f86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#a6acf461721a59cf5cf404b80b5f57f86">MaxLookAhead</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getHazardType - Return the hazard type of emitting this node.  There are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// three possible results.  Either:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; NoHazard: it is legal to issue this instruction on this cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; Hazard: issuing this instruction would stall the machine.  If some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     other instruction is available, issue it first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; NoopHazard: issuing this instruction would break the program.  If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     some other instruction can be issued, do so, otherwise issue a noop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ae5c28a180502d1923c854952292cf5f6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#a9bec0e329b12bbc503d08db497d43267">HazardType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ae5c28a180502d1923c854952292cf5f6">getHazardType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Stalls = 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#a9bec0e329b12bbc503d08db497d43267a4e42ac50bfd060349e49904842121cf1">NoHazard</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// AdvanceCycle - This callback is invoked whenever the next top-down</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction to be scheduled cannot issue in the current cycle, either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// because of latency or resource conflicts.  This should increment the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ab8cd949a59a859d00c4d0043009d4126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ab8cd949a59a859d00c4d0043009d4126">EmitNoop</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default implementation: count it as a cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ad54a4120d2dfe3212b807c1f3ad80255">AdvanceCycle</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// EmitNoops - This callback is invoked when noops were added to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#af15b23b48c3d7e7e7b39b4f204520349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#af15b23b48c3d7e7e7b39b4f204520349">EmitNoops</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quantity) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default implementation: count it as a cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; Quantity; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ab8cd949a59a859d00c4d0043009d4126">EmitNoop</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;SCHEDULEHAZARDRECOGNIZER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
